subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal reached the Paris Masters final yesterday by beating Marcos Baghdatis, 4-6, 6-4, 6-3, and knocking him out of contention for the season-ending Masters Cup.
snippet: Rafael Nadal reached the Paris Masters final yesterday by beating Marcos Baghdatis, 4-6, 6-4, 6-3, and knocking him out of contention for the season-ending Masters Cup.
